title: Love Island's Iain Stirling and girlfriend Laura Whitmore look smitten during getaway

Love Island's Iain Stirling and his girlfriend Laura Whitmore have given fans a glimpse into their relationship as they enjoy a holiday in San Francisco.

The couple, who are usually private, have been more forthcoming in posting during their USA getaway and shared a lovely picture on Thursday.

Irish Laura, 34, took to Instagram to show her and her funny beau, 31, taking in the sights at Pier 33 with a sweet capture.

Iain could be seen donning a pair of sunglasses in the image with Laura stood behind him as they posed below colourful flags.

(Image: Instagram)

The second snap of the series was a shot of cheeky Iain hoisting his sweetheart over his shoulder as he beamed.

Proving she could see the funny side, Laura captioned the post: "He prefers the second photo."

The couple are currently on a 'west to east coast' American road trip.

On Tuesday, ITV2 legend Iain posted a sweet selfie with his long-term girlfriend during their stint in California.

Iain pulled a funny unimpressed face in the snap while beauty Laura looked as glamorous as ever in a zebra printed dress and a vibrant red lipstick.

(Image: Instagram)

Iain offered his followers an explanation behind the picture.

He wrote: "Last night I went to a winery in California and didn’t drink so I could drive Laura home afterwards.

"I am posting this picture in memory of the biggest sacrifice I will ever make for another person for the rest of my life."

Highlighting the fact that he chose not to drink alcohol so that girlfriend Laura could, Iain pointed out his sacrifice and suggested how it proves his loved-up status with the presenter.

Laura didn't seem impressed with her beau's witty post as she responded: "I would like to point out that I was happy to drive..."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She recalled an earlier situation: "Until Iain said he left the camera I had handed him and repeatedly mentioned ‘to put in his back pack.’ So instead of taking pictures of the beautiful valley with my long lens.. I decided I’d get drunk."

The couple are currently road-tripping across America together in a lime-green Mustang and have documented their holiday with Instagram-worthy snaps.

Previous photos show the smitten pair visiting Alcatraz prison, the Golden Gate bridge in San Francisco and Napa Valley Wine Country.

The smitten duo met in 2016 and got together last summer, but already have a loved-up life and even recently moved in together .

Both Iain and Laura have remained coy about their romance in the past with Iain speaking for the first time in March, when he shared a gushing tribute to his girlfriend.
